# NSMenu.Properties

**Structure**

These constants are used as a bitmask for specifying a set of menu or menu item properties, and are contained by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMenu/propertiesToUpdate] property.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Properties
```

## Constants

- **propertyItemTitle**: The menu item’s title.
- **propertyItemAttributedTitle**: The menu item’s attributed string title.
- **propertyItemKeyEquivalent**: The menu item’s key equivalent.
- **propertyItemImage**: The menu image.
- **propertyItemEnabled**: Whether the menu item is enabled or disabled.
- **propertyItemAccessibilityDescription**: The menu item’s accessibility description.

## Creating an NSMenu Property

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
